WRITING.TEXT: even if he's wrong it's at least already been shot which is incredible. i assumed it would take years to write it/get the cast back together

WRITING.TITLE: CHRIS MELONI SAYS WET HOT AMERICAN SUMMER: TEN YEARS LATER IS COMING TO NETFLIX IN JUNE
Chris Meloni says Wet Hot American Summer: Ten Years Later is coming to Netflix in June

WRITING.TEXT:
he doesn't seem totally sure about the date and since there hasn't been a formal announcement of a release date i'll hold my breath, but it's at least already been shot according to him
I'M SO EXCITED

WRITING.TITLE: Chris Meloni says Wet Hot American Summer: Ten Years Later is coming to Netflix in June
